channel.title: Changing the skill hover of a 317 client
channel.description:
Before:
http://prntscr.com/5l1foy
After: (Modifying the sending data from the server)
http://prntscr.com/5l1fsz
All right,
As you can see it was one string in the tooltip being printed out: Level: 1/1-Current Xp: 0
How could I make it so that tool tip uses 2 lines? I've looked everywhere in RSInterface. I'm using Aggroth, with is based on InsidiaX which is based on PI 317.

item.title: Changing the skill hover of a 317 client
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Try putting a \n in between Level: 1/1 and Current Xp.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the skill hover of a 317 client
